item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide For L2
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide For RTL
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Markdown syntax
item.description: Connect App The connect app on windows is a boon when you wish to see your mobile screen on PC. It seamlessly connects your mobile to your PC and even allows you to control your mobile from your PC Missing After installing the latest update in my PC, I was astonished to find that the connect app was missing. After a lot of struggle, I found the most convenient way of installing it.
